Class DefaultHttp2ConnectionEncoder.FlowControlledBase

java.lang.Object
io.netty.handler.codec.http2.DefaultHttp2ConnectionEncoder.FlowControlledBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChannelFutureListener, Http2RemoteFlowController.FlowControlled, GenericFutureListener<ChannelFuture>, EventListener
Enclosing class:
DefaultHttp2ConnectionEncoder
public abstract class DefaultHttp2ConnectionEncoder.FlowControlledBase extends Object implements Http2RemoteFlowController.FlowControlled, ChannelFutureListener
Common base type for payloads to deliver via flow-control.

      public void writeComplete()
      Description copied from interface: Http2RemoteFlowController.FlowControlled
      Called after this object has been successfully written.

      The Http2RemoteFlowController will make exactly one call to either this method or Http2RemoteFlowController.FlowControlled.error(ChannelHandlerContext, Throwable).
